name: Alwans Technology Corp
description: Developer of a cloud-based restaurant management system designed to offer a holistic overview of the company and its operations. The company's system offers a tool for managing sales, transactions, inventory, employee schedules, logistics, e-commerce, and customer relationships, enabling businesses to increase their revenues and build relationships with diners.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based restaurant management system designed to offer a holistic overview of the company and its operations. The company's system offers a tool for managing sales, transactions, inventory, employee schedules, logistics, e-commerce, and customer relationships, enabling businesses to increase their revenues and build relationships with diners.
